name: The Life of Kai
description:
this is my 3rd semester study project. (SAE Institute Leipzig)

it is a fanart project based on the Dragonball universe by Akira Toriyama (Tōei Animation)

Unreal Engine 4
Substance Painter
Substance Designer
Photoshop
